SELECT c.id as chanceId,c.cust_name as custName,c.title,c.contact,c.contact_tel as contactTel,c.create_by as createBy,c.create_date as createDate,c.description,c.designee,c.status,c.designee_date as designeeDate,p.* from sales_chance c JOIN sales_plan p on c.id=p.sale_chance_id WHERE 1=1
AND cust_name LIKE '%${custName}%'
AND title LIKE '%${title}%'
AND contact LIKE '%${contact}%'
AND designee = #{designee}
